00002 namespace BehaviorTree

00005         enum INT_TEST {LESS_THAN,GREATER_THAN,LESS_OR_EQ,GREATER_OR_EQ,EQUAL,NOT_EQUAL};
00006         template <class T = NoClass>
00008 
00019         class IntCondition: public BehaviorTreeNode
00020         {
00021         public:
00023                 BEHAVIOR_STATUS execute(void* agent)
00024                 {
00025                         T* obj = (T*) agent;
00026                         bool status;
00027                         int objVal = (obj->*func)();
00028                         switch (test)
00029                         {
00030                                 case LESS_THAN:         status = (objVal < val); break;
00031                                 case GREATER_THAN:      status = (objVal > val); break;
00032                                 case LESS_OR_EQ:        status = (objVal <= val); break;
00033                                 case GREATER_OR_EQ: status = (objVal >= val); break;
00034                                 case EQUAL:                     status = (objVal == val); break;
00035                                 case NOT_EQUAL:         status = (objVal != val); break;
00036                         }
00037 
00038                         if (status)
00039                                 return BT_SUCCESS;
00040                         else
00041                                 return BT_FAILURE;
00042                 };
00043 
00044                 void init(void* agent)
00045                 {
00046                 };

00053                         test = _test;
00054                         val = _val;
00055                 }

00076                 int (* const func2)();   //A static method or function pointer, being stored as const since we don't modify it
00077                 INT_TEST test;
00078                 int val;

00082         template<>
00083         BEHAVIOR_STATUS IntCondition<NoClass>::execute(void* agent)
00084         {
00085                 bool status;
00086                 switch (test)
00087                 {
00088                 case LESS_THAN:         status = ((*func2)() < val); break;
00089                 case GREATER_THAN:      status = ((*func2)() > val); break;
00090                 case LESS_OR_EQ:        status = ((*func2)() <= val); break;
00091                 case GREATER_OR_EQ: status = ((*func2)() >= val); break;
00092                 case EQUAL:                     status = ((*func2)() == val); break;
00093                 case NOT_EQUAL:         status = ((*func2)() != val); break;
00094                 }
00095

00097                         return BT_SUCCESS;
